name: ColorConvertPurpose

properties.description: Do standard conversion, without black preservation.
properties.name: defaultpurpose

properties.description: Conversion options appropriate to creating an image for screen display.
properties.name: previewpurpose

properties.description: Conversion options appropriate to creating an image for print or export.
properties.name: exportpurpose

description: Denotes the purpose of color conversion using ConvertSmapleColor method.
